# Dominican Republic women's national under-17 and under-18 basketball team

Silver: 1 (2005) Bronze: 3 (2011, 2019, 2023)
}}
The '''Dominican Republic women's national under-17 and under-18 basketball team''' is a national basketball team of the Dominican Republic, administered by the Federaci√≥n Dominicana de Baloncesto. It represents the country in international under-17 and under-18 women's basketball competitions.
